column5: Hi all,  I'm looking into possibly booking a salmon charter on Georgian Bay. Would there be any suggestions on who to go with or who not to go with.  Thinking of later this month.  Thanks, Stan

Stan ...step on over to Lake  Huron and talk with Rick....heres his website http://64.177.125.54/index.html  Outstanding operation with the same passion....there is a reason he has sooooooo many repeat cutomers  Cheers
Honestly, I know one of the guys in our club, he used to run a couple of boats in Meaford, he's moved his kit to Lake Ontario. If you want salmon from Georgian Bay, go to the closest Sobeys or IGA.

Thanks Twocoda,  I'm definitely considering them right now.  Thank you to Fisherman and Pigeontroller too for your info as well, however, I'd prefer salmon from L Huron or GBay over Lake O for the dinner table with the kids. Just personal preference.  Thanks everyone so far for the info.  Stan
